DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pain , anxiety depression chronic pain patient without neuropathic pain compare healthy volunteer
DOC.detailed_description: Primary outcome measure : - Symptom checklist 92 Secondary outcome measure : - Hamilton Depression Anxiety Rating Scale - Major Depression Inventory - GAD-10 Anxiety Scale - Health Survey SF-36 - McGill Pain Questionnaire - Sweat test - Heart rate variability test - Coping Strategy Questionnare - Quantitative sensory test - Pain Catastrophizing Scale - Pain rating ( VAS ) - Interview
DOC.criteria: Neuropathic pain patient patient fibromyalgia Daily pain 6 month Weekly average pain score 4 ( VAS ) Treatment antidepressant , anticonvulsant pain medication except paracetamol Serious unstable medical disease Prior present diagnosis mania , bipolar psychotic disorder , delirium , suicidal , drug alcohol dependence , severe agitation Patients cooperate understand Danish
